name: Revoss
description:
A spinny space shooter game for Godot Wild Jam #22
My first attempt at making something with Godot, be gentle please!

Still in early prototype phase!

Source code is included, but please don't use it as a reference for anything, I have no idea if I'm doing things in the proper Godot way.

Note: Autofire upgrade doesn't do anything (yet).

  • Day 8
    • Upgrade shop between levels
    • Meteors that must be dodged
    • A bit of polish
  • Day 4 - 7
    • No progress.. had to work :-(
  • Day 3
    • Three ships to choose from, with different abilities
    • Basic main menu
    • Game over check
  • Day 2
    • Updated graphics, using some sprites from Kenney.nl at opengameart.org (https://opengameart.org/content/space-shooter-redux)
    • Played around with sounds (using bxfr)
    • Added two new ship abilities: shield and dual fire
  • Day 1
    • Basic protype with shapes for sprites
